com.knowledgebin.kb

Class X_Snippet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.knowledgebin.kb.X_Snippet

  • public class X_Snippet
extends Object
    Utility functions related to X_Snippet table maintenance, updates, and searches.

      • update

        public static void update(Connection conn,
                          String snippetID,
                          String label,
                          String wddata)
                   throws SQLException
        Given the snippetID, label, and wddata of an existing Snippet, rebuild the X_Snippet indexes for the snippet
        Parameters:
        conn - a Connection object to use for writing
        snippetID - the ID of the selected Snippet
        label - the label from the selected Snippet
        wddata - the wddata of the selected Snippet
        Throws:
        SQLException - on error

      • update

        public static void update(KBConfig kbConfig,
                          String snippetID)
                   throws SQLException
        Give the snippetID of an existing Snippet, rebuild the X_Snippet indexes for the snippet
        Parameters:
        kbConfig - the KBConfig for the webapp
        snippetID - the ID of the selected Snippet
        Throws:
        SQLException - on error

      • rebuild

        public static void rebuild(KBConfig kbConfig,
                           String whereClause,
                           String tags,
                           String multiValueTags)
                    throws SQLException
        Rebuild the X_Snippet table. If a where clause is not specified then the X_Snippet table is dropped and rebuilt, otherwise only the X_Snippet records specified are rebuilt. The X_Snippet table is joined to the SELECT sql if the where clause contains X_Snippet. (e.g. where clause = "X_Snippet.Value='JRESET').
        Parameters:
        kbConfig - kbConfig the KBConfig for the webapp
        whereClause - an option where clause to select specific Snippet records for X_Snippet rebuild
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • buildJoinClause

        public static String buildJoinClause(String[][] nvCriteria)
        Returns an SQL join clause for use with X_Snippet queries. The Snippet must be aliased to 't0'.
        Parameters:
        nvCriteria - an array of Name/Value array pairs. (nv[x][0] :== name; nv[x][1] :== value;)
        Returns:
        an SQL INNER JOIN clause

      • search

        public static ResultSet search(Statement stmt,
                               String fieldList,
                               String[][] nvCriteria,
                               String extraCriteria,
                               String orderByName)
                        throws SQLException
        Returns a ResultSet based on the X_Snippet criteria
        Parameters:
        stmt - an active SQL Statement
        fieldList - the list of fields to retrieve
        nvCriteria - the array of Name/Value array pairs
        extraCriteria - additional selection criteria
        orderByName - the field name on which to order the result set
        Returns:
        the ResultSet from the build query
        Throws:
        SQLException - an SQL exception

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(String configFilePath)
        Initialize the single and multi-value tag sets.
        Parameters:
        configFilePath - a path to the X_Snippet.xml file

      • updateTags

        public static void updateTags(String orgId,
                              String formId,
                              String svTags,
                              String mvTags)
        Update the XSnippet index tags, in both memory and in the config file.
        Parameters:
        formId - the form id that corresponds to the svTags to be updated
        svTags - the svTags to be updated (if null, the original values are preserved)
        mvTags - the multi-value svTags to be updated (if null, the original values are preserved)
        orgId - the organization id that corresponds to the svTags to be updated
